pr_title: Add smoke test for Logback MDC instrumentation

timeline.message: Add smoke test for Logback MDC instrumentation

timeline.bodyText: Tests fail because they don't build this application as part of the test. If you are sure that test work, you may submit two separate PRs: one for this app and another for the actual test
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText:
I've tested it locally and it worked -- I've split this one into two PRs.
Thanks!
replies.author: mateuszrzeszutek
